caption: This is an image of a small fish viewed from the side against a light background, giving it a silhouetted effect. The fish is mostly brown, with a darker patch running along the top body, from the head to the beginning of the tail. Its eye is prominent and black, making it a focal point of the image. There are visible details of the fish's scales and fins, including a set of transparent, detailed ventral and tail fins. The overall background is uniform, enhancing the focus on the fish. The lighting and clarity bring out the texture and features of the fish, emphasizing its physical characteristics.
title: National water quality laboratory: severely deformed spine of the jordanella fish is result of methyl mercury in water
